name: Cluckball - Nokia 3310 Jam 5
description:
This game was made for Nokia 3310 Jam 5 in approximately 8 hours of game development, and 2 hours spent on art including sprites, animation, and page assets.

Initial game mockup made in 20 minutes:

I wanted to go out of my comfort zone and tried to create a short & fun game that is not a platformer.

I didn't have much time to dedicate to this jam so participating in this jam with such a tiny scope was ideal.

The most difficult part to code was obviously the opponent behavior. Hard to find to right difficulty balance so I hope it is okay how it is actually.
